ai-patthana16.39:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.39:0.3_0: for the sake of preying seventy-six years...
ai-patthana16.39:1.1_0: For the sake of fondness arises dependent on the teaching, not for the sake of few wishes.
ai-patthana16.39:2.1_0: without favoring and opposing the teaching don’t give rise to cause or condition.
